## Description {#details}

Base class for all Dwarf units(Compile unit/Type table unit).

Definition at line 29 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dwarflinkerunit-h">DWARFLinkerUnit.h</a>.
